text: Randhir Singh Kapriwas is a member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Bharatiya Janata Party representing the Rewari constituency in Rewari district of Haryana.My Neta == References == Category:People from Rewari district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Haryana MLAs 2014–2019 Category:1946 births
title: Randhir Singh Kapriwas
